title: AgoraEU Updates: What Are the Council and Parliament Preparing?
content: Ahead of the Cultural Deal for Europe Policy Conversation on 3 February 2026, dedicated to culture’s place in the next EU budget, Culture Action Europe is sharing the latest updates on the AgoraEU negotiations.
creator: CAE Team
sourceDescription: We take care of the cultural ecosystem.

title: The Köln Crisis | A Psychological Intervention for a Cultural System in Breakdown
content:
